body_html: Ok, I see it is IDE "run" button causing the trouble: need to remove assembleRelease.dependsOn when building for debug ( vice versa ). So just comment that line would be fine, a patch pretty soon to fix it.
body_text: Ok, I see it is IDE "run" button causing the trouble: need to remove assembleRelease.dependsOn when building for debug ( vice versa ).  So just comment that line would be fine, a patch pretty soon to fix it.
body: Ok, I see it is IDE "run" button causing the trouble: need to remove assembleRelease.dependsOn when building for debug ( vice versa ).  So just comment that line would be fine, a patch pretty soon to fix it.
